items.title: Understanding Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Section 404

visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals

items.headline: This course provides an overview of SOX Section 404 and discusses how one can effectively implement a program.
objectives_summary: Discover the requirements of Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Section 404.
Recognize COSO and the Internal Control Framework.
Identify SEC and PCAOB ongoing SOX 404 requirements.

items.title: Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing
items.headline: An Illustrative Approach to AML/CFT Compliance
objectives_summary: Students will learn in simple ways, how money laundering and terrorism financing are disguised.
How Money Laundering started, How it is committed, why it is committed in spite of the warnings, where and when they are carried out.
Consequences of money laundering on the economic or political scape. Money laundering affects people everyday, what are the risk issues and how to manage such.

items.title: AML Compliance in Practice: Suspicious Activity Reports

visible_instructors.job_title: Online Education for Anti-Financial Crime Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Financial Crime
visible_instructors.title: Financial Crime Academy

items.headline: Learn the Fundamentals of SAR Filing in Anti-Money Laundering Compliance/KYC & How to write a stellar SAR Narrative!
objectives_summary: Understand Suspicious Activity Reports (SARs) in the context of Anti-Money Laundering (AML)
Identify sources for suspicious activity and related red flags
Learn WHEN and HOW to file a SAR (not covering particular filing systems e.g., GoAML, etc.)

items.title: Basics of Auditing A Complete Study
items.headline: Learn the fundamentals of auditing to excel in accounting and auditing career
objectives_summary: Understand Meaning of Audit
Understand Principal aspects of Audit
Understand Benefits of Auditing

items.title: Financial Risk Manager (FRM) Certification: Level I
items.headline: Unleash the Secret to Pass FRM-I Exam at One Go
objectives_summary: Lucrative career options in Risk Management, Trading, Structuring, Modeling, etc. FRM holders have positions such as Chief Risk Officer, Senior Risk Analyst, Head of Operational Risk, and Director, Investment Risk Management,
Strong value addition to your skills, credentials and resume
Complete coverage of risk management concepts.

items.title: Enterprise Risk Management (ERM) 101

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course covers the basic concepts of Enterprise Risk Management (ERM).
objectives_summary: Discover the purpose and definitions of Enterprise Risk Management (ERM).
Identify the right sized ERM to meet company objectives.
Discover how to establish a Framework for ERM.

items.title: Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Auditing Standards

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course is designed to provide a strong understanding of SOX concepts.
objectives_summary: Explore the background of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002 (SOX) and recognize the purpose of auditing standards.
Explore Auditing Standard 2 (AS2).
Management assessment process,Top down approach.

items.title: ACCA: AA (F8) - Audit and assurance

visible_instructors.job_title: ACCA Lecturer and Gold Approved Learning Partner
visible_instructors.name: Rowan
visible_instructors.title: Rowan Malherbe

items.headline: Learn what auditors are, what auditors do and how to become an auditor.
objectives_summary: Understand a basic understanding of the audit environment.
Understand how to conduct an external audit through various audit procedures.
Understand the audit cycles from planning, execution and audit reports.

items.title: Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) General and Applications Controls

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course speaks directly to the importance of general controls (GC), application controls (AC) and spreadsheet.
objectives_summary: Identify controls to evaluate as it relates to Information Technology (IT) and Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX).
Explore the IT Control Framework, and recognize how to approach IT evaluation.
Explore IT Entity controls.

items.headline: This course examines the process of building and managing an effective risk management program.
objectives_summary: Discover the building blocks for effective risk management and mitigation.
Identify actions to strengthen risk governance and minimize people risk.
Explore the risk management process and best practices on risk assessment.

items.title: Fundamentals of Audit - A Crash Course
items.headline: Make strong foundation in Basics of Audit
objectives_summary: Nature of Audit
Objective of Audit
Scope of Audit

visible_instructors.title: Compliance Security and Risk Management

items.headline: Compliance risk management CRM for Compliance, Risk Management, Internal Audit and IS Security Professionals
objectives_summary: Understand the foundations of Compliance Risk Management CRM in a company or institution. How the compliance risks are managed in Organizations
Understand the Governance and Compliance Culture attributes in CRM model.
How companies are creating strong Compliance Functions and Environment to avoid penalties and reputation losses.

items.headline: This course is designed to examine the typical red flags and highlight the best practices on fraud prevention.
objectives_summary: Explore key factors contributing to fraudulent behaviors.
Identify common fraud schemes.
Discover the process to mitigate fraud risks.

items.title: The Fundamentals of Risk-Based Auditing

visible_instructors.name: Illumeo

items.headline: This course is designed to prepare the auditor to fully embrace the risk based audit methodology concept.
objectives_summary: Explore Risk over the past decade.
Recognize the benefits of Risk Based Auditing.
Explore Risk Based Auditing (RBA) and recognize the purpose of Internal Auditing (IA).

items.title: Sanctions Compliance Bootcamp – Including AML/KYC Lectures

visible_instructors.name: Financial Crime
visible_instructors.title: Financial Crime Academy

items.headline: Learn to navigate the increasingly complex sanctions compliance landscape and how to effectively manage sanctions risks
objectives_summary: Explain the term sanctions in the context of economic and financial sanctions
Exemplify various relevant types of economic sanctions in a globalized world
Understand how international sanctions work including extraterritoriality and blocking statutes

items.title: Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) Identifying and Documenting Controls

visible_instructors.job_title: Condensed and Efficient Courses for Busy Professionals
visible_instructors.name: Illumeo
visible_instructors.title: Illumeo Learning

items.headline: This course explores how identifying and documenting controls for Sarbanes-Oxley.
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: Explore the types and methods of internal controls.
Identify controls related to Initiation, Authorization, Processing and Recording.
Identify the various methods of documentation, and recognize the differences between control narratives vs. control flowcharts.
